017package org.apache.juneau.http.resource;
018
019import java.io.*;
020import java.util.function.*;
021
022import org.apache.juneau.http.entity.*;
023import org.apache.juneau.http.header.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
025
026/**
027 * A streamed, non-repeatable resource that obtains its content from an {@link Reader}.
028 *
029 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
030 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauRestCommonBasics">juneau-rest-common Basics</a>
031 * </ul>
032 */
033@FluentSetters
034public class ReaderResource extends BasicResource {
035
036   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
037   // Instance
038   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
039
040   /**
041    * Constructor.
042    */
043   public ReaderResource() {
044      super(new ReaderEntity());
045   }
046
047   /**
048    * Constructor.
049    *
050    * @param contentType The entity content type.
051    * @param contents The entity contents.
052    */
053   public ReaderResource(ContentType contentType, Reader contents) {
054      super(new ReaderEntity(contentType, contents));
055   }
056
057   /**
058    * Copy constructor.
059    *
060    * @param copyFrom The bean being copied.
061    */
062   protected ReaderResource(ReaderResource copyFrom) {
063      super(copyFrom);
064   }
065
066   @Override
067   public ReaderResource copy() {
068      return new ReaderResource(this);
069   }
070
071   // <FluentSetters>
072
073   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.resource.BasicResource */
074   public ReaderResource setCached() throws IOException{
075      super.setCached();
076      return this;
077   }
078
079   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.resource.BasicResource */
080   public ReaderResource setChunked() {
081      super.setChunked();
082      return this;
083   }
084
085   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.resource.BasicResource */
086   public ReaderResource setChunked(boolean value) {
087      super.setChunked(value);
088      return this;
089   }
090
091   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.resource.BasicResource */
092   public ReaderResource setContent(Object value) {
093      super.setContent(value);
094      return this;
095   }
096
097   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.resource.BasicResource */
098   public ReaderResource setContent(Supplier<?> value) {
099      super.setContent(value);
100      return this;
101   }
102
103   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.resource.BasicResource */
104   public ReaderResource setContentEncoding(String value) {
105      super.setContentEncoding(value);
106      return this;
107   }
108
109   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.resource.BasicResource */
110   public ReaderResource setContentEncoding(ContentEncoding value) {
111      super.setContentEncoding(value);
112      return this;
113   }
114
115   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.resource.BasicResource */
116   public ReaderResource setContentLength(long value) {
117      super.setContentLength(value);
118      return this;
119   }
120
121   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.resource.BasicResource */
122   public ReaderResource setContentType(String value) {
123      super.setContentType(value);
124      return this;
125   }
126
127   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.resource.BasicResource */
128   public ReaderResource setContentType(ContentType value) {
129      super.setContentType(value);
130      return this;
131   }
132
133   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.resource.BasicResource */
134   public ReaderResource setHeaders(HeaderList value) {
135      super.setHeaders(value);
136      return this;
137   }
138
139   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.resource.BasicResource */
140   public ReaderResource setUnmodifiable() {
141      super.setUnmodifiable();
142      return this;
143   }
144
145   // </FluentSetters>
146}
